Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani, Mookie Betts and Freddie Freeman started the game with consecutive home runs, the first time that has happened in the Dodgers’ history
Gurriel Jr. doubled to center, McCarthy scored and Pederson scored
Suárez hit sacrifice fly to center, Gurriel Jr. scored
Ohtani hit sacrifice fly to center, Muncy scored, Rojas to third
Freeman singled to center, Rojas scored, Kiermaier to third
Gurriel Jr. homered to left (387 feet)
Muncy singled to right, Lux scored
Carroll hit sacrifice fly to right, Guillorme scored
Edman singled to right, Taylor scored and Lux scored
